name: Stops_StopDetails
description: View facilities at a specific stop (Metro and V/Line stations only)

stop_id.description: Identifier of stop; values returned by Stops API

route_type.description: Number identifying transport mode; values returned via RouteTypes API

stop_location.description: Indicates if stop location information will be returned (default = false)

stop_amenities.description: Indicates if stop amenity information will be returned (default = false)

stop_accessibility.description: Indicates if stop accessibility information will be returned (default = false)

stop_contact.description: Indicates if stop contact information will be returned (default = false)

stop_ticket.description: Indicates if stop ticket information will be returned (default = false)

gtfs.description: Incdicates whether the stop_id is a GTFS ID or not

stop_staffing.description: Indicates if stop staffing information will be returned (default = false)

stop_disruptions.description: Indicates if stop disruption information will be returned (default = false)

$ul: **disruptions**: Disruption information applicable to relevant routes or stops
**station_description**: The definition applicable to the station_type; returns null for V/Line train
**station_type**: Type of metropolitan train station (i.e. "Premium", "Host" or "Unstaffed" station); returns null for V/Line train
**audio_customer_information**: Indicates if there is at least one audio customer information at the stop/platform

**escalator**: Indicates if there is at least one accessible escalator at the stop/platform that complies with the Disability Standards for Accessible Public Transport under the Disability Discrimination Act (1992)
**hearing_loop**: Indicates if there is a hearing loop facility at the stop/platform
**lift**: Indicates if there is an elevator at the stop/platform
**lighting**: Indicates if there is lighting at the stop
**platform_number**: Indicates the platform number for xivic information (Platform 0 indicates general stop facilities)
**stairs**: Indicates if there are stairs available in the stop
**stop_accessible**: Indicates if the stop is accessible
**tactile_ground_surface_indicator**: Indicates if there are tactile tiles (also known as tactile ground surface indicators, or TGSIs) at the stop
**waiting_room**: Indicates if there is a general waiting area at the stop

**low_ticket_counter**: Indicates if there is at least one low ticket counter at the stop that complies with the Disability Standards for Accessible Public Transport under the Disability Discrimination Act (1992)
**manouvering**: Indicates if there is a space for mobility device to board on or off a transport mode

**parking**: Indicates if there is at least one accessible parking spot at the stop that complies with the Disability Standards for Accessible Public Transport under the Disability Discrimination Act (1992)
**raised_platform**: Indicates if there is a raised platform to board a train
**raised_platform_shelther**: Indicates if there is shelter near the raised platform
**ramp**: Indicates if there are ramps (<1:14) at the stop/platform
**secondary_path**: Indicates if there is a path beyond the stop which is accessible
**steep_ramp**: Indicates if there are ramps (>1:14) at the stop/platform

**telephone**: Indicates if there is at least one accessible telephone at the stop/platform that complies with the Disability Standards for Accessible Public Transport under the Disability Discrimination Act (1992)

**toilet**: Indicates if there is at least one accessible toilet at the stop/platform that complies with the Disability Standards for Accessible Public Transport under the Disability Discrimination Act (1992)
**car_parking**: The number of free car parking spots at the stop
**cctv**: Indicates if there are CCTV (i.e. closed circuit television) cameras at the stop
**taxi_rank**: Indicates if there is a taxi rank at or near the stop
**toilet**: Indicates if there is a public toilet at or near the stop
**latitude**: Geographic coordinate of latitude at stop
**longitude**: Geographic coordinate of longitude at stop
